Posts.Content:
If it is, we take care of it. Mine is in 3 areas
and it is early stage. I hope, if your is, it too
is early stage and get it before it gets you. 
My prayers are with you!! Please keep me posted. 
The HARDEST part is the fear of the unknown!! 
Keep Smiling
Tammy
Posts.Title: Microcalcifications

Posts.Content:
Thanks for your reply. I was diagnosed with breast
Cancer in 3 areas. Unfortunately my surgeon cannot
Save the breast due to the amount of area and the fact
That I am an A cup size. I have opted for a double
Mastectomy, scheduled for August 20th. God willing everything will be 
Fine. I am very happy with my surgeons. I will keep you posted. 
Keep Smiling
Tammy
